title: Riot<3
body: I'm having fun with the Preseason 6 changes. <3 Keep the content coming. :)

replies.body: Glad you're enjoying it! Make sure you drop down any and all feedback you have for us since we are still in the process of tuning everything. We especially love hearing all of the stuff you're loving!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot ThEntropist,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Xhvq73j5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-12T01:22:50.588+0000)
>
> Glad you're enjoying it! Make sure you drop down any and all feedback you have for us since we are still in the process of tuning everything. We especially love hearing all of the stuff you're loving!

Personally I love the new change, it keeps me looking forward to other things and wanting more that's to come in the future!  Thanks for taking this big step, I wasn't a fan of the new Masteries and all at first until I realized i have so many paths I can go down which brings my mind to thinking and I've already created about 4 pages that i'm satisfied with, with the results in games.  So really thanks for this! It's giving me a much more fun experience in general.
except they obviouslt favor ad champs

Awesome! I've found that the new masteries bring a new kind of excitement to the game for me. Since I kinda choose my play style before the game starts, with the different keystones, it makes it really fun to see if pay off in game. 

Glad you're liking it as well!

K, maybe not everything. The Rift Herald is too strong and the "SHUT DOWN" announcements are too common now. They also take priority over multi-kill announcements which I think they shouldn't.

And is there another word we can use for "SHUT DOWN"? IIRC, we used "ICED" in Season 1/2.
I love everything! :) Keep it up. :D

>

I like it more, but It made me drop off my support main to a Fizz top main because items are confusing

I just hate the new adcs, they overwhelm any squishy support.

That's pretty much it.

I like the Quinn and Cait changes, and how support items combine with sightstone. Other than that though.... 

: /
